issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Some tests in TestDistCpSystem fails by timeout.
https://builds.apache.org/job/hadoop-qbt-trunk-java8-linux-x86/366/

comments.body:
The tests started failing after https://builds.apache.org/job/hadoop-qbt-trunk-java8-linux-x86/361/, so probably the commits between https://builds.apache.org/job/hadoop-qbt-trunk-java8-linux-x86/361/ and https://builds.apache.org/job/hadoop-qbt-trunk-java8-linux-x86/362/ are related.

However, I cannot reproduce the timeout in my environment, so I'll try to extend the timeout.
